item.title: The Statistical Accessibility of Medical Papers
item.description: Similarly, if a reader had knowledge of t-tests, contingency tables, nonparametric tests, epidemiologic statistics, Pearson’s correlation, simple linear regression, analysis of variance, transformations, and nonparametric correlation (topics typically included in introductory statistics courses), then 21 percent of the articles would be accessible.
